# Seating plan

```
-----DD--------------
CJO    |    |    PP |
       |____| SS PP |
              SS    |
JJJJJ  CCCC   SS PP |
JJJJJ  OOOO      PP |
                    |
  XX    XX   XXW   |
             WW    |
     JO   OO   PPP |
JJ   JO   OO   PPP |
JJ   JO   OO       |
CJ   JO   OO       |
CJ   JO   OO   PPP |
CJ   JO   OO   PPP |
CJ   JO   OO       |
--------------------

-DD-: Door
CJO: Dana
X: Pillar
W: Water Cooler
S: Stairs to Mezz
J: Junior
C: Coach
O: Mid or senior or, if space, an alumni
P: Mid or senior project team member
```
